entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 in the evening then light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
